description:
Run automatic direct message to new members
requires confirmation by reaction
Stop automatic direct message to new members

change the message that will be sent to new members
requires confirmation by reaction
displays messages to be sent to new members

change bot status. 
list of status [online, offline, idle, dnd, invisible]

change bot activity. 
list of <type> [playing, completing, custom, listening, streaming, unknown, watching]

lock user with <user id> for reply DM
 this command only can be use on DM channel by owner

unlock user on reply DM channel
 this command only can be use on DM channel by owner
